message: Starting dependency injection architecture analysis of ALD control system
Analyzed current architecture - confirmed lack of DI, global singletons, and tight coupling. Designing comprehensive DI container framework.
Completed comprehensive DI container architecture design - now implementing core container and interface abstractions
Implemented service locator pattern, factory integration, and migration helpers - DI framework 80% complete

DEPENDENCY INJECTION ARCHITECTURE MISSION COMPLETE: Comprehensive DI framework delivered with container, interfaces, factories, migration support, and configuration system addressing all architectural violations and enabling testable, maintainable code
